original_text: Of the birds according to their kinds, and of the animals according to their kinds, of every creeping thing of the ground, according to its kind, two of every sort shall come in to you to keep them alive.
korean_text: 새가 그 종류대로, 가축이 그 종류대로, 땅에 기는 모든 것이 그 종류대로 각기 둘씩 네게로 나아오리니 그 생명을 보존하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Of the birds according to their kinds,
and of the animals according to their kinds,
of every creeping thing of the ground,
two of every sort shall come in to you
